sense.gloss: to discern (e.g. right from wrong), to discriminate, to distinguish
to know (manners, one's place, etc.), to understand, to bear in mind

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑年齢↑↓ねんれい↓なのだから、もっと↑分別↑↓ふんべつ↓を|わきまえる|べきだ。
sdata.e: You ought to know better at your age.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちが↑意識↑↓いしき↓してほかの↑礼儀↑↓れいぎ↓↑正↑↓ただ↓しさの↑形↑↓かたち↓を|わきまえる|ことが↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓である。
sdata.e: Therefore it is important for us to be aware of other forms of politeness.

sdata.j: ↑第↑↓だい↓↑一↑↓いち↓には、ものの↑見方↑↓みかた↓を↑正↑↓ただ↓しくしてその↑原因↑↓げんいん↓と↑結果↑↓けっか↓とをよく|わきまえる|。
sdata.e: First, they should have right ideas of things, ideas that are based on careful observation, and understand causes of effects and their significance correctly.
